UMHB's policy on Classroom Expectations and Ethics will be strictly upheld in this course. If you have not read it and all subsequent sections, it is your responsibility to do so.  You may find it online here:  \href{http://catalog.umhb.edu/2020-2021/Graduate-Catalog/Classroom-Expectations-and-Ethics}{\texttt{Classroom Expectations and Ethics}}.  The omnibus policy outlines University requirements concerning Christian citizenship, students' responsibilities, class attendance, academic decorum, and academic integrity.
